title: Mirror Image
description: David Oxley's life seems to be going from bad to worse. He's divorced, lives in a share house with the landlady from hell and his boring dead-end job is literally driving him around the bend… Then, after a young woman goes missing in the dead of night and chance encounter in a rundown café early the next morning with a blond woman called Tracey, everything changes…On the road, you never know who you're going to meet!
author: Patti Roberts
